Intransitive Verbs: 伝わる: to spread, go around
終わる: to finish, to end
下がる: to fall, lower, drop
Transitive Verbs: 下げる: to lower, pull down, reduce

Intransitive Verbs: 曲がる: to bent, curve, turn
見つかる: to be found
倒れる: to fall (to the ground), collapse
Transitive Verbs: 倒す: to throw down, knock down

Intransitive Verbs: 撮れる: to be photographed, be recorded
Transitive Verbs: 撮る: to take (photo), to record (video)

Intransitive Verbs: 生まれる: to be born
写る: to be in a photo, be projected
Transitive Verbs: 写す: to copy, transcribe, photograph
帰す: to let a person go back

Intransitive Verbs: 出る: to go out, leave, depart
Transitive Verbs: 出す(*exception): to take out, let out, put out

Intransitive Verbs: 直る: to be fixed, be repaired
治る: to be cured, be recovered
回る: to turn, rotate, revolve, spin
Transitive Verbs: 回す: to turn, rotate, spin

Intransitive Verbs: 逃げる: to run away, escape
Transitive Verbs: 逃がす: to set … free, let …go
冷やす: to cool, to make … cold
消す(*exception): to erase, turn off
飛ばす: to fly, send (up), splash

Intransitive Verbs: 沸く: to boil, be excited
空く: to become vacant, empty
聞こえる: to be heard
片づく: to be in order, be finished
Transitive Verbs: 片づける: to put … in order, settle
立てる: to set up, put up
付ける: to spread, apply, stick, attach
見る: to look (at), watch, see
寝かせる: to send … to bed
乗せる: to give a person a ride
